name: Where Is My Crown?
description:
After partying hard and over consumption of Honey the King went to sleep...

Only to find out the Royal Crown is missing in the morning and just before a big public ceremony!!

"Where is my Crown?" asked the King

Talked to the castle inhabitants to find clues about last night and find your crowns before the time runs out

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2021 SEA Game Jam.

Thank you very much for reading through, hope you'll like the game!
Please leave a comment or any feedback is appreciated

Thank you to the amazing Team Kluwung!
Nikko, Michael, Nana, Sonnya and Amel
